alert.note: Alert for Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 19 at 5:08AM EDT until September 19 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Swift River at Roxbury. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to flood stage this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
